USDOI - BLM - Nevada State Office - Mapping Sciences National Conservation Areas Nevada (poly) vector digital data
Reno, Nevada USDOI - Bureau of Land Management
US DOI Bureau of Land Management Unknown National Landscape Conservation System (NLCS)
nv_ncaUnpublished Material
This data represents the boundaries of designated National Conservation Areas in Nevada. This data was collected to assist in land use planning and management using GIS technology. This data also represents the NCA unit of the National Landscape Conservation System (NLCS). The attribute data is standardized in accordance with the NLCS GIS Boundary Standards issued in WO-IM 2003-021. en Microsoft Windows NT Version 4.0 (Build 1381) Service Pack 6; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.2.0.700publication date20030224CompleteAs needed-119.8212-114.817041.601335.7953264829.781250681927.8750003964166.5000004607599.500000NoneNational Conservation AreaNCANevadaBlack Rock DesertHigh Rock CanyonRed Rock CanyonBlack Rock Desert High Rock Canyon National Conservation AreaSloan CanyonNoneAlthough this data was compiled on the BLM computer system at the Nevada State Office, no liability is assumed for the current accuracy or utility of the data on any system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty for individual or aggregate data use with other data. The BLM shall not be held liable for improper use of the data described and/or contained herein. Box 12000RenoNV89502USA775-861-6400mobrien@nv.blm.gov7:30 - 4:30Unclassified
The attributes are standardized in accordance with NLCS Standards for GIS. The attributes were verified for accuracy.
Polygon data were collected and ground truthed at the field office the data originated from.

775-861-6400 mmckee@blm.gov 7:30am - 4:30pm US Bureau of Land Management - Nevada State OfficeRick Crawford, Stephen Lincoln, Robert Taylor, Marguerite McKee
These data were collected and verified at the Winnemucca and Las Vegas BLM Field Offices. The two data files were merged together using xtools for ArcView 3.2. The resulting shapefile was standardized in accordance with the NLCS GIS Boundary Data Standards as directed in WO IM 2003-021, and converted to an ArcInfo coverage using the SHAPEARC command.ArcView 3.2, xtools extension, ArcInfo8.220030221 GIS Specialistmailing addressP.O. Polygons have unique identification values, and all polygons are closed.These data represent the designated National Conservation Areas in Nevada to date.N/A

The Bureau of Land Management (BLM) provides these geographic data "as is." BLM makes no guarantee or warranty concerning the accuracy of information contained in the geographic data. BLM further makes no warranties, either expressed or implied, as to any other matter whatsoever, including, without limitation, the condition of the product, or its fitness for any particular purpose. The burden for determining fitness for use lies entirely with the user. Although these data have been processed successfully on computers of BLM, no warranty, expressed or implied, is made by BLM regarding the use of these data on any other system, nor does the fact of distribution constitute or imply any such warranty. Technical_Prerequisites have ArcInfo, ArcView or any other GIS that will read an ArcInfo export (*.e00) file.
